Review.Titre: bad experience with EasyWp
Review.Contenu: One of the worst services I had ever seen and had bad support, I bought hosting, separate SSL, and email. after the website setup, I came to know you can't install your cache plugin ep-rocket due to their own plugin, I redesigned my website and paid extra, after installing the lightest weight theme Generate Press I faced a server issue, I reach them but nothing was handled from them, Now am again going to buy another hosting. Bad experience

Review.Titre: Very unhelpful team
Review.Contenu: Very unhelpful team. problem going on for few days. always delaying matters

Review.Titre: Really bad experience
Review.Contenu: Two months of going back and forth with customer support, who isn't able to solve a problem that keeps occurring. Really disappointed, and yes, I'm migrating.

Review.Titre: Just a bad all round experience
Review.Contenu: Just a bad all round experience. Migration was problematic as their support team changed the effective domain name during restoration meaning a load of internal links broke and their support staff could only offer to restore again which would have meant us losing sales that had happened since.Then the website even with a turbo subscription was slow and sluggish. Their CDN also means that changes propagate slowly and inconsistently so you make a change and it seems to take ages, or deleting media shows the media deleted then it re-appears.In the end we lost all confidence in EasyWP and migrated back to our old server, since then visits to our website have increased and we can work on updates more confidently.

Review.Titre: Want a downtime of 30+ hours in a month? Choose this
Review.Contenu: Worst hosting. I have the highest plan of theirs and guess what? Their downtime is over 30 hours a month. I usually don't feel this disappointed with hostings but this company is just worst.- their server always keeps showing 504. O mean c'mon ! How can you be performing so "cheap" like your own name? - Support is worst- Don't get lured by their discount, they are selling u cheap product ( far worse than any simple hosting of under 2 dollar a Month) at much higher rates. Just boycott this type of companies.

Review.Titre: I totally do not recommend this EasyWP…
Review.Contenu: I totally do not recommend this EasyWP hosting if you are hosting multiple languages website. It has strong caching. My problem was that objects on my WordPress website never change when you switch the language unless you clear the cache every time you click. They never warn you about this because this is for better speed and performance but they don't care about UX. And the funny part is they don't refund even they are guilty in this case. NEVER EVER USE

Review.Titre: The support is not great
Review.Contenu: The support is not great. Had one of the worst experience with a support person that did not try their best to resolve the issue. This review is purely based on one support rep as before that other reps at least tried.

Review.Titre: Site interface always breaks down in…
Review.Contenu: Site interface always breaks down in both of my websites and it only shows visitors simple texts. worse experience ever

Review.Titre: The worst hosting EVER!
Review.Contenu: It's the first time that write I a review. TLDR; The worst hosting company ever!!!You should be aware that free SSL is not provided with the Starter Plan, and you should go for the Turbo Plan. This is when 99% of hosting companies provide free SSL with Let's Encrypt. Anyways, I went for the Turbo Plan but even after that I couldn't activate the SSL!!! I asked their support and they told that it's only available for the domains on Namecheap(Their parent company)!!! I must buy a domain from them or migrate my domain to namecheap to use free SSL!After talking for a while the other option was to move my DNS from Cloudflare to ... you named it Namecheap! What I needed was hosting with SSL but they were forcing me to move my Domain or DNS to Namecheap.

Review.Titre: I've never written a review before for but...
Review.Contenu: I've never written a review before for any hosting company, so this is a first.Bad.Almost felt like I was the victim of some sort of social prank, that bad. Frustrating doesn't begin to cover it.Firstly, I'll say I've got websites hosted with multiple companies for various set ups. I wanted one domain, one wordpress install on a wordpress specialist host. As much to test the service as anything.The set up was really easy. The performance seemed impressive too.But that's where it ends.I'd say, if your domain name is already with namecheap, you'd probably be fine. But if it's not? Look out!The sheer rigmarole of trying to get a straight answer on how to set up to make my domain work with their hosting was laughably bad.Each support request just redirected me to knowledgebase articles that had already been read, tried and shown to not have worked. I got the feeling that the support only knows how to send links out, rather than actually provide advice from a position of hosting knowledge.To cap it off - because I REALLY tried and I REALLY wanted to exhaust all options before cancelling a service less than 24 hours after paying for it; my very final support request was met with an attempt to just upsell. Pure nonsense. Purchased it. Tried it. Couldn't get it to work. Simply would not recommend based on the amount of time spent getting absolutely nowhere with support, which bodes very poorly were I to have stayed.

Review.Titre: Please Avoid
Review.Contenu: This is a low-quality company. Low-quality product and vomit-inducing support assistants. Please spend your money elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Downtime of more than 20 hours, yet still 99.99% uptime?
Review.Contenu: Had a downtime of more than 20 hours in October and they still claim 99.99% uptime at their sales pages. For proof: easywp.statuspage.io

Review.Titre: Terible Interface
Review.Contenu: Terible InterfaceNo Free SSL Don't use it, there are much better options

Review.Titre: This service is very difficult to use
Review.Contenu: This service is very difficult to use, for example you cannot get help without entering all your domains and id's and then also a customer service PIN ? Why would they jot be able to pull your accounts by name and email?  I THINK it is meant to be deliberately difficult ie. you can't just cancel either, back to all your info, services, a special PIN. Also they do try to add services, and the price keeps changing. I have gotten 2 price change notices in 2 weeks. I seem to get 1 or 2 emails a day about it. If I ever get it all cancelled I would not sign up again for those reasons. I HATE being pushed around when I want something or to cancel something.

Review.Titre: Very complicated options if your domain not from namecheap
Review.Contenu: Very complicated options again and again name cheap support team help me ..thanks for support team

Review.Titre: Caching from Woocommerce pages does not…
Review.Contenu: Caching from Woocommerce pages does not help EasyWP for woo commerce shops. My shop in experiencing bad times with that. Add to cart shows No item in cart most times. Do fix that. All great except this, reason for 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Website wrongfully deleted for monthly 'non-payment', although I paid for the annual subscription
Review.Contenu: There was some strange issue regarding my subscription. I paid for a year, but I continued to receive emails prompting me to renew my monthly subscription. Then my website was suddenly discontinued; the support specialist told me my subscription was cancelled due to non-payment and the site deleted.However, they then found out that I've actually paid for an annual subscription and the information about non-payment was wrong.So they managed to quickly restore the website from the backup. But all my development efforts were lost, as the website returned to its default condition.I told that to the support specialist, and they restored the website's design, layout, content and plugins to its previous state.In the end, I think the support service works great, and I'm grateful to the support guys for resolving my issue quickly.On the maintenance part, however, there was some serious oversight which led to the unrightful deletion of my website.

Review.Contenu: Give us free email like with the shared hosting accounts.

But then I stumbled upon EasyWord Press, and suddenly, I'm feeling like the Bill Gates of blogging! This platform is so user-friendly that even my toaster is jealous. If you want to blog without breaking a sweat or your keyboard, give EasyWord Press a go. It's like magic, but without the need for a wizard's hat! 🧙‍♂️✨

I have learned a lot thanks the technical support and in this way I was able to run my website.Emerzon Guevara.

Review.Titre: EasyWP Turbo Hosting Review: Making WordPress Faster and Safer
Review.Contenu: I've been using EasyWP Turbo for my WordPress website, and I'm thoroughly impressed with the experience. The speed boost it offers is remarkable. Thanks to optimized caching and SSD storage, my website loads faster than ever before. The robust security features, including protection against DDoS attacks and a powerful firewall, provide me with peace of mind.Furthermore, the EasyWP Turbo interface is incredibly user-friendly, even for beginners like me. I've also found their customer support to be responsive and helpful whenever I have questions or issues. The product comes with valuable additional features like automatic backups and quick recovery, which have been instrumental in keeping my website secure and running smoothly.The pricing of this service is reasonable considering the benefits I've received, and I believe EasyWP Turbo is an excellent choice for WordPress website owners looking to enhance speed and security. I highly recommend EasyWP Turbo to anyone in search of reliable WordPress hosting.I hope this helps you create a useful product review!

Review.Titre: its was so fast and they did so much…and helpfull

Review.Titre: EasyWP: The Best Option for WordPress Web Optimization
Review.Contenu: EasyWP is the best option for beginners who understand how to optimize WordPress themes, media files, and code structure to achieve super-fast website loading.Currently, I have nearly 7,000 pages of information, and each page contains an image or poster, totaling almost 4GB of data. It's working well for me as I've just started a new project. It's an affordable way to begin something new. I anticipate upgrading to the Supersonic option as the number of users grows to enhance their experience.If anyone encounters slow loading times or other issues, it largely depends on how well our theme is coded and developed, as well as how we optimize each article's images before posting. It's essential to use fewer plugins when they're not necessary. By following these practices, EasyWP becomes the best choice.I understand that website optimization, caching methods, and using a CDN (Content Delivery Network) to reduce server requests are crucial. If you're familiar with these three to five simple concepts, then EasyWP, particularly the Turbo and Supersonic options, is the best choice.Let me provide you with more insight based on my experience of almost a month. It's perfectly well-coded on the backend with the latest hardware, especially CPUs and RAM. This made me choose it because many less famous companies use second-hand hardware, which doesn't lead to a robust server response.This review you can read before purchasing and In future if I get such error and things what i read already __ I will be welcome back here to give another short in details...
